title: Belle Poque Women's High Waisted Wide Leg Jeans Button Decorated Casual Stretchy Demin Pants with Pockets
description: 【Style】Wide Leg pants but not too wide, stylish, and stunning on the longer leg. A fitted cut through the entire leg and a smart front crease
【Features】 high waisted wide-leg pants, elastic waist, great stretch elastic to comfy, Button Decorated,Pockets

【OCCASION】Women high waist baggy pants with pockets fit for casual daily wear, homeware, night clubwear, party wear, outdoor, workout, holiday, festival, dance, etc. Meets your daily outfit needs, and shows stylish and unique charm
【Recommended matching】Easy pair with a lace-up crop top, hollow-out shirt, tank tops, camisoles, high heels, smocking shoes, flats, sneakers, ankle boots, etc

【CLOTHING CARE】Hand wash recommended or Machine washable with cold water(Better to put it in the mesh washing bag). Please NO BLEACH and flat dry. Other colored clothes should be washed separately to avoid dye

Women's High Waisted Wide Leg Denim Pants Summer Breathable Stretchy Trousers with Pockets She hates wrinkles, so don't be surprised if she resists those.Women's casual pant mixing business with pleasure, feminine blouses and brunch with her besties.High Waisted Wide Leg Pants Features:  *2 pocket,can put phones keys or other small things *Lapel collar *Wide Leg silhouette *Long Length *Concealed buttons inside Button FrontLined  *Occasion: It is excellent for daily wear, outer wear, office, shopping, dating, travelling, party, club and all occasions.
